description:
Kuno has fallen in love with the “pigtailed girl.” Not knowing who this girl really is, Kuno entrusts Ranma with delivering a gift…
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ranma and... Ranma? If It`s Not One Thing, It`s Another
Ranma e Ranma: Le incomprensioni continuano
Ranma to Ranma? Gokai ga Tomaranai
乱馬とらんま? 誤解がとまらない
